data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Samiei, Jahangir Vajed, Dab, Koosha, Ghezellou, Parviz, Shirvani, Arash (2013): Some scleractinian corals (Scleractinia: Anthozoa) of Larak Island, Persian Gulf. Zootaxa 3636 (1): 101-143, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3636.1.5
